   21: %%
   22: -module(mnesia2_registry_test).
   23: -author('hakan@erix.ericsson.se').
   24: -compile([export_all]).
   25: -include("mnesia2_test_lib.hrl").
   26: 
   27: init_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   28:     mnesia2_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   29: 
   30: end_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   31:     mnesia2_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   32: 
   33: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   34: all() -> 
   35:     [good_dump, bad_dump].
   36: 
   37: groups() -> 
   38:     [].
   39: 
   40: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   41:     Config.
   42: 
   43: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   44:     Config.
   45: 
   46: 
   47: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   48: good_dump(doc) ->
   49:     ["Dump a faked C-node registry"];
   50: good_dump(suite) -> [];
   51: good_dump(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   52:     [Node] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
   53:     T1 = gordon,
   54:     ?match(ok, mnesia2_registry:create_table(T1)),
   55:     One = {T1, 1, 0, integer, 0, 10},
   56:     Two = {T1, "two", 3, integer, 0, 20},
   57:     Three = {T1, 3, 0, string, 6, "thirty"},
   58:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:dirty_write(One)),
   59:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:dirty_write(Two)),
   60:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:dirty_write(Three)),
   61:     ?match([One], mnesia2:dirty_read({T1, 1})),
   62:     ?match([_ | _], dump_registry(Node, T1)),
   63: 
   64:     NewOne = {T1, 1, 0, integer, 0, 1},
   65:     NewFour = {T1, "4", 1, string, 4, "four"},
   66: 
   67:     ?match([NewOne], mnesia2:dirty_read({T1, 1})),
   68:     ?match([Two], mnesia2:dirty_read({T1, "two"})),
   69:     ?match([], mnesia2:dirty_read({T1, 3})),
   70:     ?match([NewFour], mnesia2:dirty_read({T1, "4"})),
   71: 
   72:     T2 = blixt,
   73:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, {no_exists, _}}},
   74: 	   mnesia2:dirty_read({T2, 1})),
   75:     ?match([_ |_], dump_registry(Node, T2)),
   76: 
   77:     NewOne2 = setelement(1, NewOne, T2),
   78:     NewFour2 = setelement(1, NewFour, T2),
   79: 
   80:     ?match([NewOne2], mnesia2:dirty_read({T2, 1})),
   81:     ?match([], mnesia2:dirty_read({T2, "two"})),
   82:     ?match([], mnesia2:dirty_read({T2, 3})),
   83:     ?match([NewFour2], mnesia2:dirty_read({T2, "4"})),
   84:     ?match([_One2, NewFour2], lists:sort(restore_registry(Node, T2))),
   85:     
   86:     ?verify_mnesia2(Nodes, []).
   87: 
   88: dump_registry(Node, Tab) ->
   89:     case rpc:call(Node, mnesia2_registry, start_dump, [Tab, self()]) of
   90: 	Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
   91: 	    Pid ! {write, 1, 0, integer, 0, 1},
   92: 	    Pid ! {delete, 3},
   93: 	    Pid ! {write, "4", 1, string, 4, "four"},
   94: 	    Pid ! {commit, self()},
   95: 	    receive
   96: 		{ok, Pid} ->
   97: 		    [{Tab, "4", 1, string, 4, "four"},
   98: 		     {Tab, 1, 0, integer, 0, 1}];
   99: 		{'EXIT', Pid, Reason} ->
  100: 		    exit(Reason)
  101: 	    end;
  102: 	{badrpc, Reason} ->
  103: 	    exit(Reason)
  104:     end.
  105: 
  106: restore_registry(Node, Tab) ->
  107:     case rpc:call(Node, mnesia2_registry, start_restore, [Tab, self()]) of
  108: 	{size, Pid, N, _LargestKeySize, _LargestValSize} ->
  109: 	    Pid ! {send_records, self()},
  110: 	    receive_records(Tab, N);
  111: 	{badrpc, Reason} ->
  112: 	    exit(Reason)
  113:     end.
  114: 
  115: receive_records(Tab, N) when N > 0 ->
  116:     receive
  117: 	{restore, KeySize, ValSize, ValType, Key, Val} -> 
  118: 	    [{Tab, Key, KeySize, ValType, ValSize, Val} | receive_records(Tab, N -1)];
  119: 	{'EXIT', _Pid, Reason} ->
  120: 	    exit(Reason)
  121:     end;
  122: receive_records(_Tab, 0) ->
  123:     [].
  124: 
  125: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  126: bad_dump(doc) ->
  127:     ["Intentionally fail with the dump of a faked C-node registry"];
  128: bad_dump(suite) -> [];
  129: bad_dump(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  130:     [Node] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
  131:     
  132:     OldTab = ming,
  133:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, _}}, mnesia2_registry:start_restore(no_tab, self())),
  134:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:create_table(OldTab, [{attributes, [a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m,n,o,p,q]}])),
  135:     ?match({'EXIT',{aborted,{bad_type,_}}}, dump_registry(Node, OldTab)),
  136:     ?match(stopped, mnesia2:stop()),
  137: 
  138:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, _}}, mnesia2_registry:create_table(down_table)),
  139:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, _}}, mnesia2_registry:start_restore(no_tab, self())),
  140:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, _}}, dump_registry(Node, down_dump)),
  141: 
  142:     ?verify_mnesia2([], Nodes).
  143:
